typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	alds_folder as string,
	staging_directory as string,
	destination_folder as string,
	keycolumn as string,
	source_schema as string,
	source_table as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: '$alds_folder',
	folderPath: 'concatWS(\'/\',$staging_directory,$destination_folder)') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourcekeys
source1, sourcekeys join($keycolumn == $keycolumn,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: ($alds_folder),
	folderPath: (concatWS('/',$staging_directory,$destination_folder)),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($keycolumn)],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
